item.description: Whatâ€™s #NaNoWriMo? â€œWHAT? 50k words?!â€ What Iâ€™m Planning to Write About Lightning Fast FAQs Whatâ€™s Next? Whatâ€™s #NaNoWriMo? National Novel Writing Month is an event that was started by Chris Baty in July 1999. Since its humble beginnings with 21 participants back then, it has grown into a global phenomenon with several hundred thousand people doing it every year during November.

item.title: Establishing a Workflow for 2019 (and beyond)
item.description: What is a workflow? What I Currently Do Where in the world did these steps come from? Inspiration & Ideation Implementation, Analysis, & Presenting Cleaning & Reflecting A Workflowâ€™s Role in Data Science For DataBasedâ€™s inaugural blog post (ğŸ‰) I wanted to write about something that I always find myself thinking about when I work on or think about a new project: workflows! No workflow is perfect nor are they linear.

item.title: About
item.description: Every data analysis has an underlying story. From successes and surprises to what worked and what did not, DataBased is meant to capture and convey the journey from start to finish. It is also meant to showcase the fact that data science is not necessarily a linear or isolated experience. Along the way, events, related projects, milestones and new experiences will naturally sprout up and impact perception and one’s understanding of the world around them.
